Good Comments: Pros: Soft-subbed (can be a negative if you have a slow comp), translated by the same group that does the manga, and so far they are ahead of Triad.  Cons: The audio is muted, you have to turn the volume way up and still doesn't sound that great.
A few small grammatical errors but other then that good subs.
Softsubbed unlike Triad. Faster release and better quality. These are the same people who also scanlate the manga.
In DMC, the subtitles weren't synchronized at all.
BEAUTIFUL subs and video/ audio quality. actually one of the best fansubs I have ever seen!
Don't like their work on the OP, but otherwise good.
Bad Comments: Better translation and release speed, lower filesize, softsubs. The group of choice, imo.
At least as good and much faster than Triad.
high quality, soft subs,subbing decently and on time
Big sized font, text everywhere. Font size should be smaller, put translation notes at thew top.
The sound is incredibly low and sometimes the translations feel awkward.
